name: Mastery: Ignite
description:
Your target burns for an additional 13.5% over 9 sec of the total direct damage caused by your Fireball, Fire Blast, Scorch, Pyroblast, and Flamestrike. If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Ignite.

Fire Blast causes your Ignites to spread to 4 nearby enemies.
